casebody.data:
IN RE Estate of Joel Soloman WEINGRAD Peri Weingrad, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Constance L. Jones, Personal Representative of the Estate of Joel Soloman Weingrad, Defendant,
and
Randi M. Weingrad, Estate of Lillian Weingrad, Estate of Helen V. Gallagher, Cushman & Wakefield, and Ann Arbor Lawn Care And Snow Removal, Defendants/Cross-Defendants,
and
Barbara L. Roth, Defendant/Cross-Plaintiff/ Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
Stephen Weingrad, Third-Party Defendant. SC: 157108
COA: 341107 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 13, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
